body_html: I find first gpu's forward propagation is much slower than other gpus on same machine when training resnet101 using grpc+gdr on a 4 gpus worker machine (grpc may have same problem, but grpc is much slower so it may hide the problem.), I have run many times, trace file is in here.
body_text: I find first gpu's forward propagation is much slower than other gpus on same machine when training resnet101 using grpc+gdr on a 4 gpus worker machine (grpc may have same problem, but grpc is much slower so it may hide the problem.), I have run many times, trace file is in here.
body: I find first gpu's forward propagation is much slower than other gpus on same machine when training resnet101 using `grpc+gdr` on a 4 gpus worker machine (`grpc` may have same problem, but `grpc` is much slower so it may hide the problem.), I have run many times, trace file is in [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B6phHPK0iUvdSk9hV2NIY1hkZ3M/view?usp=sharing).
